text: "Under the Milky Way" is a 1988 song by Australian rock band The Church. It appears on their fifth studio album Starfish. It went to number 22 in Australia, number 24 in the United States, number 25 in New Zealand, number 69 in Canada, number 70 in the Netherlands and number 90 in the United Kingdom. It has been covered by Strawpeople and Sia. ==Track listing== == References == Category:1988 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:The Church songs Category:Sia songs
title: Under the Milky Way
